entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is described as a wizards' bank where they keep their gold.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the one who brings Harry to Gringotts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who sends Hagrid on important tasks, including fetching things from Gringotts.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a place that might be safer than Gringotts.

entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are described as the ones who run Gringotts bank.

relationships.description: Hagrid works at Gringotts, fetching things for Dumbledore.
Dumbledore sends Hagrid to fetch things from Gringotts.
